channel.title: Java Remove? [updated]
channel.description: I goto add/remove programs and I try to remove java and it wont uninstall, the remove button has been removed on the list. :confused: I need to know how to remove it manually can anyone please help me :confused:

item.title: Java Remove? [updated]
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

No fuck that i fixed it with a system restore but my java is still sketchy…

Read full topic

item.title: Java Remove? [updated]
item.dc:creator: @Poxer Poxer
item.description:
@Poxer wrote:

Format the HD and make a fresh install of your operating system.
Warning: All data will be lost, back it up to another computer or external HD and disconnect it during format and installation.

While using Windows you should make a fresh install at least every four months if not needed before that. This since it fills up with shit quickly and a reinstall goes faster than cleaning. It also removes possible errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Java Remove? [updated]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:3, topic:428789”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=531484.msg3883831#msg3883831 date=1326262089]
Go to program files, and delete the folder name java? Doesn’t really seem like rocket science.
[/quote]
that wouldn’t remove any lingering registery files, have you tried Revo Uninstaller[/quote]
That’s just what you have to put up with when using windows. It shouldn’t stop you from installing a new version of Java.

Read full topic

Go to program files, and delete the folder name java? Doesn’t really seem like rocket science.

This action is only valid for products that are currently installed.”
